spec.rawSql: SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_SP02 ORDER BY data_hora ASC

SELECT local, situacao, valor
FROM (
    SELECT 
        local,
        situacao,
        data_hora,
        valor,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY local ORDER BY data_hora DESC) AS rn
    FROM V_TEMPERATURA_POR_COMODO
) t
WHERE rn = 1;

SELECT 
  data_hora as time, 
  bpm as BPM, 
  temperatura 
FROM EC_DATA.V_BPM_CRAWLER 
WHERE $__timeFilter(data_hora);
SELECT * FROM V_MAX_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_HRS_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_LM_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_MQ_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_MFR_ATUAL;
SELECT * FROM V_LDR_ATUAL;
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_HRS3300 LIMIT 50

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN UPPER(TRIM(COALESCE(local, ''))) = 'BEDROOM' AND valor < 20 THEN 'Dormindo'
    ELSE 'Acordado'
  END AS "status"
FROM
  TBL_SENSORES
WHERE
  sensor_id = 202
ORDER BY
  data_hora DESC
LIMIT 1;

SELECT
  local AS "Cômodo",
  COUNT(*) AS "Número de Visitas"
FROM (
  SELECT
    local,
    LAG(local, 1, '') OVER (ORDER BY data_hora) AS local_anterior
  FROM
    TBL_SENSORES
  WHERE
    local IS NOT NULL AND local != '' and local != 'Global'
) AS t
WHERE
  local != local_anterior
GROUP BY
  local
ORDER BY
  "Número de Visitas" DESC;

WITH transitions AS (
  SELECT
    TRIM(local) as current_local,
    LAG(TRIM(local), 1, '') OVER (ORDER BY data_hora) AS previous_local
  FROM
    TBL_SENSORES
  WHERE
    local IS NOT NULL AND TRIM(local) != ''
)
SELECT
  COUNT(*) AS "Trocas de Cômodo"
FROM
  transitions
WHERE
  current_local != previous_local;
SELECT status FROM V_STATUS_INATIVIDADE;
SELECT chance FROM EC_DATA.TBL_CORRCARDIACA order by data_hora desc LIMIT 1;
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_LM35 ORDER BY data_hora ASC LIMIT 50
SELECT risco_percentual FROM EC_DATA.V_ANALISE_RENAL LIMIT 50

spec.description: Com base na análise dos registros mais recentes do paciente, estima-se o nível de risco para o desenvolvimento de doenças renais, considerando os padrões observados em seus dados de saúde.
spec.title: Índice de Risco Renal (%)

spec.rawSql: SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_MQ7 ORDER BY data_hora ASC
SELECT valor AS "Valor", data_hora AS "Data Hora" FROM EC_DATA.V_LDR ORDER BY data_hora ASC
SELECT COUNT(situacao), situacao FROM EC_DATA.V_SITUACAO_BPM GROUP BY situacao LIMIT 50
